lead_paragraph: It was the closest a North Korean missile had come to Japan since 1998. Prime Minister Shinzo Abe called it a “serious threat.”

byline.contributor: Jonathan Soble contributed reporting from Tokyo.

headline.main: North Korea Fires Ballistic Missile Into Waters Off Japan

snippet: It was the closest a North Korean missile had come to Japan since 1998. Prime Minister Shinzo Abe called it a “serious threat.”...
